attributes.action: Debate the reformation of UK-US ambassadorial role.
attributes.additional_details:
The relationship between Nigel Farage & the Trump administration hegemonize any relationship Sir Kim Darroch may create.

In a day and age whereby the British Government is indecisive, for fear of reprisal from the EU, we demand a backbone. Stand up for the national interest not the vested interests.
attributes.background: Since the UK Government thought it fitting to debate banning Donald Trump. We the British public demand the Government debate the pros and merits of Nigel Farage being appointed US ambassador.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about specific appointments.

We could accept a more general petition calling for a debate on the role of UK ambassador to the USA.
